exercises.name: Shoulder Flexion Stretch
exercises.description: Raise your left arm forward and up, keeping it straight. Good for shoulder mobility and rotator cuff recovery.
exercises.instructions: Start with arm at your side. Hold for 5 seconds, then raise your LEFT arm to shoulder height over 1 second. Hold for 5 seconds, then lower over 2 seconds.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl
exercises.description: Standing bicep curl exercise. Strengthens biceps and improves arm strength. Great for arm rehabilitation.
exercises.instructions: Stand with arm relaxed at your side. Hold 5 seconds, then curl your LEFT arm up bending at the elbow over 2 seconds. Hold for 3 seconds, then lower slowly over 2 seconds.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squat
exercises.description: Standing squat exercise. Strengthens legs, glutes, and improves lower body mobility. Good for knee and hip rehabilitation.
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Hold 5 seconds, then squat down bending your knees over 2 seconds until thighs are parallel. Hold for 3 seconds, then stand back up over 2 seconds.

exercises.name: Seated Arm Raise
exercises.description: Seated arm raise to shoulder height. Improves shoulder mobility and strengthens arm. Good for elbow and shoulder recovery.
exercises.instructions: Sit with arm relaxed at your side. Hold 5 seconds, then raise your LEFT arm vertically to shoulder height over 1 second. Hold for 5 seconds, then lower slowly over 2 seconds.

exercises.name: Seated Knee Extension
exercises.description: Straighten your leg while seated. Strengthens quadriceps and helps with knee recovery.
exercises.instructions: Sit with knee bent. Hold 5 seconds, extend LEFT leg over 2 seconds until nearly straight. Hold 3 seconds, then lower over 2 seconds.

exercises.name: Standing Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.description: Lunge position stretch for hip flexors. Helps with hip pain and lower back issues.
exercises.instructions: Stand upright. Hold 5 seconds, step into a lunge over 2 seconds. Hold stretch 5 seconds, return to standing over 2 seconds.

exercises.name: Gentle Neck Rotation
exercises.description: Slowly turn your head side to side. Helps with neck stiffness and tension.
exercises.instructions: Face forward. Hold 5 seconds, turn head slowly to one side over 2 seconds. Hold 3 seconds, return over 2 seconds.

exercises.name: Ankle Mobility Circles
exercises.description: Rotate your ankle in circles. Good for ankle sprains and foot mobility.
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet flat. Hold 5 seconds, lift LEFT foot over 1 second. Hold and rotate ankle 5 seconds, lower over 1 second.

exercises.name: Wall Push-Up
exercises.description: Push-ups against a wall. Good for shoulder and chest strengthening with low impact.
exercises.instructions: Stand facing wall, arms straight. Hold 5 seconds, bend elbows over 2 seconds. Hold 1 second, push back over 2 seconds.

exercises.name: Standing Quad Stretch
exercises.description: Pull your heel toward your buttock while standing. Stretches front of thigh.
exercises.instructions: Stand on right leg. Hold 5 seconds, pull LEFT heel toward buttock over 2 seconds. Hold 5 seconds, lower over 2 seconds.
